content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Cleaning your phone's screen and getting a new case can make a big difference in its performance and overall health.

Remember to be gentle when cleaning your screen, and avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive materials that can damage it. And when shopping for a new case, take your time to read reviews and do your research to find one that fits your phone perfectly and provides the right level of protection.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask. I'm always here to help.

Good luck with the cleaning and case shopping, and I hope your phone starts performing better soon!

(And don't forget to take care of your phone's battery life, too. Remember to charge it correctly, avoid overcharging, and update your operating system regularly to keep your phone running smoothly.)
